about_the_game:
This chapter is narrated by Reimu Hakurei. Join her as she searches for answers to a series of mysterious and tragic events that will change her view of Gensokyo and the youkai forever!

Synopsis:

Several months have passed since the events of the Prologue. Reimu is finishing the preparations for the Shrine Festival, where she hopes to make some money and put the Myouren Temple and the Moriya Shrine back in their places. It's unfortunate, though, that Kasen reveals a new mysterious disease plaguing the beasts at the very last moment; meanwhile, Mamizou unexpectedly makes some changes to her and Reimu's little "operation", aiming to enlighten Sumireko, who has been acting increasingly reckless in recent months. But it's all going to be okay, right?

What awaits you:

  • Over 30 hours of exciting plot with lots of unexpected replay value! The FIRST TWO DAYS are currently available, and the full playthrough of them will take 6-7 hours.
  • Experience multiple stories on repeated playthroughs, with lots of choices that lead to completely different endings!
  • Explore the vastness of the world of Touhou Project! Travel to the various corners of Gensokyo, the Underworld, the Netherworld and Higan.
  • Plenty of story illustrations and detailed character sprites!
  • A rich soundtrack full of variety!
